attributes.action: Put in place a fair prescription charge for ALL the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unfair that people in England pay the same taxes and national insurance as people in Scotland and Wales yet pay the full prescription charge when Scotland and Wales get reduced fee or free prescriptions. This needs to be made fairer, either by making prescriptions free in England, or bringing back prescription charges in Scotland and Wales.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
